text: Bùi Văn Hiếu (born 2 October 1989) is a Vietnamese footballer who plays as a midfielder for V.League 2 club Bình Định and the Vietnamese internationals. == References == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Hanoi Category:Vietnamese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:V.League 1 players Category:Hà Nội F.C. players Category:Vietnam international footballers Category:Than Quảng Ninh F.C. players Category:Footballers at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Vietnam
title: Bùi Văn Hiếu
